comment.author: 34586311@N05
comment._content: Want to know more about how we found this map and why we added it to the set? Check out the August 14th post on our blog.

comment.author: 30977505@N00
comment._content: Not sure where it is on the map, but I've heard that the National Cash Register building at the L&C Expo is now home to McMenamin's St. Johns Pub & Theater after many years as a church and then a event venue.  The pub is at Ivanhoe & Richmond in Portland's St. Johns neighborhood.

comment.author: 34586311@N05
comment._content: You are quite right! Check out the McMenamins' page to learn more about the history of the building. And thanks to Kakapo31 for this picture of the pub today. [http://www.flickr.com/photos/benchan/3154932040/]
